Conjuration 3

Revive Wights
Ritual
D2
spell id [id]: 741
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 533
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 5
gems required [gemcost]: 20D
Summon Units:#533 Wight x 5
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
With this ritual, the necromancer revives a small group of Wights and binds them to serve. Wights are armed with horrible Bane Blades that cause mortal flesh to decay and shrivel.
